EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-04-24 Intro to Kubernetes.ES-4/24 Last Last Chance Invite - Marketo.Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: =?utf-8?Q?=E2=98=B8=EF=B8=8F_See_you_in_2_hours=3F?=
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join our webinar, "Introduction to Kubernetes for Multicloud Scale," <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> TODAY at 11 am ET to learn how to get the full benefits of Kubernetes!
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>
Topics we'll cover during this one-hour session include:
- What is Kubernetes - Why so many leading organizations are adopting it - Key problems you can solve with Kubernetes
Save your seat now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> and you'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
